tagged_story_for_tts:
Sockets: The Silent Veins of the Digital Ether

Cold copper tongues<[silence:1000ms]>licking at the pulse of unseen currents<[silence:1000ms]>
A handshake of ghosts<[silence:1000ms]>—synapse and solder<[silence:1000ms]>in a dance of ones and voids<[silence:1000ms]>
The socket hums,<[silence:1000ms]>a cathedral of pings<[silence:1000ms]>where data kneels to be blessed by voltage<[silence:1000ms]>
Rust creeping like ivy<[silence:1000ms]>over ports left weeping<[silence:1000ms]>for connections long severed<[silence:1000ms]>
A plug’s embrace—<[silence:1000ms]>firm, electric, fleeting<[silence:1000ms]>before the world goes wireless and forgets<[silence:1000ms]>
Static hymns<[silence:1000ms]>sung through frayed insulation,<[silence:1000ms]>the last prayer of a dying signal<[silence:1000ms]>
The wall listens,<[silence:1000ms]>its hollows stuffed with the screams<[silence:1000ms]>of a thousand unanswered requests.
clean_story:
Sockets: The Silent Veins of the Digital Ether

Cold copper tongueslicking at the pulse of unseen currents
A handshake of ghosts—synapse and solderin a dance of ones and voids
The socket hums,a cathedral of pingswhere data kneels to be blessed by voltage
Rust creeping like ivyover ports left weepingfor connections long severed
A plug’s embrace—firm, electric, fleetingbefore the world goes wireless and forgets
Static hymnssung through frayed insulation,the last prayer of a dying signal
The wall listens,its hollows stuffed with the screamsof a thousand unanswered requests.
